column4: Saveas: why did you ban me, I pasted the file like you asked???!
he meant paste it on the pastebin website: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/
how was I supposed to know that, sorry, but I'm a new comer here, a warning and recommendation first would have been nice...
usually you are just banned to stop the scrolling, he probably just forgot to unmute you afterwards, but you should talk with him or just forget about it and try to get help again
i'll try again. I cannot get java to install, apt-get install sun-java5-jre fails. I've updates /etc/apt/sources.list with universe and re-ran apt-get update but still no joy....
you actually need multiverse, not universe
I uncommented four lines in that file, two for universe and the other I believe were multiverse (the ones with comments before about uncommenting)
you probably uncommented the dapper-backports multiverse.  But first, are you running dapper?
running 6.06 LTS download a week or two ago
k, go ahead and put your /etc/apt/sources.list on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/ , then give us the URL here
http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/18241
ok, try this without the quotes, 'gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list', and then add " multiverse" to the end of lines 19,20, 34, and 35
you are a star! seems to be working now....
great
I take it I should revert back to the original sources.list to be safe for future updates?
no, those are fine, I'll have the bot send you a link explaining them so you can decide for yourself
thanks again for your assistance, bye.
np, bye
what fonts?
deleting things in your home will not affect your ability to install things
what are you trying to install?  How are you trying?  What exactly happens when you try?  (please answer all of these questions, not just some)
one sec -- phone
